name: Zombie Survival Alpha
description:
Alpha test of my university submission game, currently players can survive through 2 waves of enemies, however the second is infinite, Players can collect one gun aside from the starting one and then switch between the two.

Controls: 

WASD to move, mouse to turn

Left click to shoot

R to reload

Q to switch weapon

X to buy a weapon while standing on it

P to pause

Music is currently broken, or at least from testing anyway, so if it works for you, please let me know so I can look into it.

If you have any comments or criticisms then please feel free to comment or email me at ShuadenGaming@gmail.com
